name: Unique Puzzles for a Yankee Echo Alfa Romeo
blurb:
Do you love unique and challenging puzzles? So do we.
Get a year of puzzles from world‑class constructors. Brought to you by Puzzazz.

name: The Maze of Games Audiobook Narrated by Wil Wheaton
blurb: An audio version of Mike Selinker and Pete Venters' Maze of Games interactive puzzle novel, narrated by actor and author Wil Wheaton.

name: The Maze of Games: An Interactive Puzzle Novel
blurb: An interactive puzzle novel written by Mike Selinker, with enchanting illustrations by Pete Venters.

name: BEE AMAZED!  Learn Who's Who in the Hive.
blurb: Bee Amazed! Geo Tots' eco-educational apps for tots ages 2-6.  Honey bee mazes teach Who's Who in the Hive!

name: Puzzle Your Kids!
blurb: Amazing puzzles for kids 9 and up, delivered straight to your (or your child's) inbox.

name: Codex Silenda: The Book of Puzzles
blurb: Codex Silenda is a five page book that features five intricate puzzles. The user must solve each page’s puzzle to unlock the next page.

name: Evil Twins Jigsaw Puzzle
blurb: Can you find the twins, clones, look-alikes, and doppelgängers in this crowd of 300 faces from Don’s notebook?

name: Bird's Eye View 1892 Map of Atlanta - 1000 Piece Puzzle
blurb: 1000 piece jigsaw puzzle featuring a beautiful historic bird's eye view map of 1892 Atlanta and the surrounding area (20 x 28 in)

name: Logical Leaps and Landings: an Adalogical Ænigmas Collection
blurb: Countess Ada Lovelace brings you all of the challenging logic puzzles from the first two years of her Adalogical Ænigmas series!

name: Piece of Cake Crosswords
blurb: A weekly series of original, highly entertaining crossword puzzles with no obscure, only-seen-in-xwords answers. Try the sample puz!

name: 1000 Piece Fairy Jigsaw Puzzles by Alison Spokes
blurb: These fairies have fallen into 1000 pieces! Can you put them back together?

name: TWO EXTRAORDINARY *1000 PIECE* PUZZLES
blurb: Every window, every character - tell a different story. Over 60 stories are woven throughout the fabric of these companion pieces.

name: The Never Ending Maze
blurb: In this book is one single challenging maze that stretches over twenty pages. Do you have what it takes to solve the Never Ending Maze?

name: The Conjurer's Almanaq: Escape This Book
blurb: The Conjurer’s Almanaq is the ultimate guide to the conjuring arts. Or is it? Start reading and you'll be trapped inside!

name: Wooden Fractal Tray Puzzles
blurb: FOUR fiendishly complicated tray puzzles based upon space filling fractal curves. Often copied, but these are the original designs.

name: Cosykiller Year 2: The Curse of King Humanrah
blurb: Building on the success of Cosykiller Year 1 - we're developing year 2's story - set in Egypt - now's the time to sign up and get perks

name: Art by Ashkeri Jigsaw Puzzles & Prints

name: The Inkubator

name: Waves Puzzle
blurb: Modern acrylic puzzles that help you unplug and rediscover the joy of physical play. Play like an architect!

name: Human Anatomy Jigsaw Puzzles: Real Biology, Larger-Than-Life

name: Wooden Fractal Tray Puzzles 2
blurb: Four more fiendishly complicated tray puzzles based upon space filling fractal curves.

name: PuzzleTales: Interactive Puzzle Stories
blurb: An interesting sci-fi tale with more than two dozen puzzles to solve as you read and explore this non-linear story.

name: The VOC Treasure - Escape Game / At Home Mystery
blurb: You are a treasure hunter who has to find clues and solve puzzles and riddles to find your treasure.

name: *Buzzed Puzzles* New-School Art On An Old-School Game
